title: WTB- Hamilton and Ryan Mayo Plug
author: Irishcollector

posts.post_title: WTB- Hamilton and Ryan Mayo Plug
posts.post_content:
Hi All,
 
Looking for both Billy Hamilton and James Ryan Mayo’s Cut Plug cards.

Will look at any condition graded and ungraded/raw. If graded preferably lower grades/ authentic.

PayPal ready and willing to make a deal if the card is right.

Thanks in advance!
